column4: What are the minimum specs for a laptop to do some decent work on it, like browsing IM and IRC.
I don't know, but I have a Celeron 300MHz with 192MB RAM that works well enough with xubuntu
Ok thx, i have a P3 455mhz with 64 ram, so the bottleneck is the ram i think?
I guess 64MB is roughly the RAM minimum for your requirement
you mean to only "run" ubuntu, not work with it?
you will need a special install CD for that little RAM. Better to get a hold of some extra RAM from somewhere.
Ok thx :), what is that install cd called?
I responded specific to the app requirement you mentioned.
I can't remember, but you can't miss it on www.xubuntu.org
Hmm, my laptop is very very slow when i Browse, IRC and IM.
your question should have been 'My laptop is very slow with Xubuntu. What can I do?' rather than about minimum requirements.
yeah sorry about that, my english grammer isnt that good :)
that's a matter of common sense, not grammar.
